% https://q.uiver.app/?

\begin{tikzcd}
$$
	& {} & {} & {} \\
	& {P \in \mathrm{Ann}(f) \\ \mathrm{Sp}(f) \subset \mathrm{Rac}(P)} & {f \in \mathscr{G}\ell (E) \Leftrightarrow0 \notin \mathrm{Sp}(f)} \\
	& {\textcolor{red}{\text{Spectre}} \\ \lambda\in \mathrm{Sp}(f) \Leftrightarrow \exist x\not=0_E, f(x)=\lambda x} & {} \\
	{\textcolor{red}{\text{Polynôme caractéristique}} \\ \chi_f(\lambda) = \det(\lambda\mathrm{Id}_E-f) \\ m_f(\lambda): \text{ordre de la racine } \lambda \text{ dans } \chi_f} && {\textcolor{red}{\text{Sous-espace propre}} \\E_{\lambda}(f)= \mathrm{Ker}(\lambda\mathrm{Id}_E-f)} \\
	{g \text{ endomorphisme induit par } f \\ \chi_g |\chi _f \\ \chi_f(\lambda) = \lambda^n -\mathrm{Tr}(f) \lambda^{n-1} + \cdots + (-1)^n \det(f)} && {\text{Les sep sont des sev stables par } f \\ f \circ g = g \circ f \Rightarrow E_\lambda(f)  \text{ stable par } g }
	\arrow["{\textcolor{limegreen}{\dim E_\lambda(f) \leqslant m_f(\lambda)}}"{description}, tail reversed, from=4-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\textcolor{limegreen}{\small{\lambda \in \mathrm{Sp}(f) \Leftrightarrow \dim E_\lambda(f) \geqslant 1}}}"{description, pos=0.7}, curve={height=-24pt}, tail reversed, from=3-2, to=4-3]
	\arrow[tail reversed, from=4-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow[tail reversed, from=4-1, to=5-1]
	\arrow[curve={height=-12pt}, tail reversed, from=3-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\textcolor{limegreen}{\text{Cayley-Hamilton} \\ \chi_f (f) = 0}}"{description}, curve={height=30pt}, tail reversed, from=2-2, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{\textcolor{limegreen}{\small{\lambda\in \mathrm{Sp}(f) \Leftrightarrow\chi_\lambda(f) = 0}}}"{description}, shift left=2, 
	curve={height=24pt}, tail reversed, from=3-2, to=4-1]
$$
\end{tikzcd}
